edge: The film Bell Bottom is based on true events that took place during the 1980s.
Bell Bottom is a film based on true events that showcases some of the unforgettable heroes of the 1980s.
The production of Bell Bottom was officially announced in November 2019.
Principal photography for Bell Bottom took place in Glasgow in a single schedule during the film's production.
Another location for principal photography of Bell Bottom was London during its production.
